dcterms:creator: Zhilin Yang
William W Cohen
Ruslan Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: A well-known citation network dataset where each node represents a document and edges denote citation links. Each node has a bag-of-words feature vector and a label indicating its category.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Zhilin Yang
William W Cohen
Ruslan Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: Another well-known citation network dataset similar to Cora, where each node represents a document and edges denote citation links. Each node has a bag-of-words feature vector and a label indicating its category.
dcterms:title: Pubmed

dcterms:creator: Benedek Rozemberczki
Carl Allen
Rik Sarkar
dcterms:description: A page-page graph of verified Facebook sites where nodes are official Facebook pages and edges correspond to mutual likes between them. Node features are extracted from the site descriptions, and the labels denote site category.
dcterms:title: Facebook

dcterms:creator: Benedek Rozemberczki
Rik Sarkar
dcterms:description: A social network dataset collected from the music streaming service LastFM where nodes denote users and links correspond to friendships. The task is to predict the home country of a user given the artists liked by them.
dcterms:title: LastFM
